definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
to hope for/to long for/to expect

sentences.english: The lively call look unripe brightness, jin's call sedate and easy.
sentences.chinese: 活潑的叫顧盼生輝，矜特叫穩重大方。

sentences.english: And look upon my self and curse my fate.
sentences.chinese: 顧盼着身影，詛咒自己的生辰。

sentences.english: Yeluu galloped his horse up a hillock; stopped at the top; and surveyed the field, enjoying with great pride.
sentences.chinese: 耶律洪基縱馬上了一座小丘，立馬丘頂，顧盼自豪。

sentences.english: In everyone look around talk smile, but I always feel arrive lose just some little.
sentences.chinese: 在大家的顧盼談笑中，我卻總感覺到些許的失落。

sentences.english: Hold my hand and let's walk slowly, seeing everything as children.
sentences.chinese: 握着我的手緩步走着，像孩童一般顧盼。

sentences.english: It's just that people were too busy looking to the right and left, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 只是人們都忙着左右顧盼了。

sentences.english: Life had not taught her domination.
sentences.chinese: 生活沒有教她顧盼自得。

definition: to chat with a low voice
to float in the air/swiftly/nimbly/easy and relaxed
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
two trees that grow together as one/fig. conjugal union
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
